Intro to Maps

![Pak Map](/pak_map.png){width=80%}

```{r}

library(leaflet)
library(magrittr)

m = leaflet() %>% addTiles() 
m %>% 
  setView(85.32350, 27.64656, zoom = 17) %>% 
  addPopups(85.32350, 27.64656, "Here is the <b>ICIMOD HQ</b>, Lalitpur")
  
```
